cscie55.hw2

Class Elevator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie55.hw2.Elevator

  • public class Elevator
extends java.lang.Object
    Create an Elevator class. The class has a one-argument constructor. Use the toString method to print out the elevator moving states. The elevator starts on the first floor and goes up. When the elevator reaches the top floor, it starts going down. Passengers may board on the elevator. Once it reaches elevator capacity, the elevator will throw an exception. This Elevator stops and discharge the patient at a floor a passenger wants to get off. This Elevator can also stop at a floor that has passengers waiting, and board the passengers until it reaches it full boarding capacity.
    Version:
    1.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • currentFloor

        public int currentFloor()
        A get methods to make currentFloor reachable by other classes.
        Returns:
        the current floor number the elevator arrives at

      • passengers

        public int passengers()
        A get method to make the passengerInElevator reachable by other classes.
        Returns:
        the passenger number currently inside the elevator

      • move

        public void move()
        Create a method for the elevator movement. If direction is up, each move of elevator move up one elevator floor; if direction is down,each move of elevator move down one elevator floor. When reach the top floor or bottom floor, the elevator will change the direction. The elevator stops at the floor where there are passengers need to get off. When the elevator stops, all passengers whose destination is that floor must leave. passengerDestinationFloor is an array that records the passenger number who will get off each floor. The elevator also stops at the floor where passengers are waiting, and board them onto the elevator When the elevator reaches full capacity, it stops loading passengers, and throws an exception

      • boardPassenger

        public void boardPassenger(int destionationFloorNumber)
                    throws ElevatorFullException
        create a method to add a passenger to the destination floor. When a new passenger boards, adds the passenger number to their destined floor, in the meantime increases passengerNumber in the elevator.
        Parameters:
        destionationFloorNumber - the floor that a passenger will get off the elevator
        Throws:
        ElevatorFullException
